query: SELECT hospital_full, metric_unit, date_trunc_ym(month_start_date) AS month, SUM(value) AS total_value WHERE month_start_date>='2022-09-01' GROUP BY hospital_full, metric_unit, month ORDER BY hospital_full, metric_unit, month

column_metadata.metric_unit: The unit of the metric reported in the value column
column_metadata.month: Aggregated by month from the month_start_date
column_metadata.total_value: Sum of the values for the metric

table_metadata.title: Ambulance Patient Offload Times
table_metadata.description: This dataset includes aggregated metrics of ambulance patient offload time for ambulance transports to San Francisco hospitals.
table_metadata.whom_it_may_interest: Healthcare professionals, hospital administrators, EMS services, healthcare policy makers

whom_it_may_interest: Healthcare professionals, hospital administrators, EMS services, healthcare policy makers
title: Ambulance Patient Offload Times
